layman_description: How much durability wear an item can take before breaking.
technical_description: Sets the maximum degradation value before item destruction.
player_impact: Items with higher degradation capacity last longer between repairs.

layman_description: Time before creatures rest and fall asleep when inactive.
technical_description: Cooldown setting for entity sleep state transition.
player_impact: Affects how quickly sleeping zombies and animals settle down after activity.

layman_description: Whether a fused weapon starts its timer when you trigger it.
technical_description: Boolean flag to initialize explosive countdown on activation.
player_impact: Determines if fused weapons arm immediately or need manual priming.

layman_description: Visual effect that plays when you mine or harvest resources.
technical_description: Toggles display effect during resource gathering animation.
player_impact: Controls whether harvesting creates visual feedback to the player.

layman_description: Marks objects that appear far away and can be simplified.
technical_description: Flag for distant rendering optimization handling.
player_impact: Allows the game to render far-away blocks faster without detail loss.

layman_description: Cooldown time between consecutive jumps for creatures.
technical_description: Interval setting for entity jump ability reuse.
player_impact: Affects how quickly zombies can jump repeatedly to reach you.

layman_description: Whether an item stays with you after your character dies.
technical_description: Toggles persistence of item inventory on player death.
player_impact: Equipped items marked as keepsake don't drop on death.

layman_description: Damage level needed to break a creature's legs and slow it.
technical_description: Health ratio threshold for limb incapacity triggering.
player_impact: How much damage breaks zombie legs and reduces their movement speed.

layman_description: Maximum energy a block can store or output per second.
technical_description: Upper limit for electrical energy in block systems.
player_impact: Determines how many tools a power supply can run at once.

layman_description: Position where creatures aim when attacking your head.
technical_description: Vertical offset for pathfinding target point on entity.
player_impact: Affects where zombies direct attacks relative to your position.

layman_description: How much product a crafting block makes from one batch of ingredients.
technical_description: Quantity value for bulk production from single resource unit.
player_impact: Increases output efficiency of furnaces and production blocks.

layman_description: Audio effect that plays when a turret gets too hot.
technical_description: Sound file reference for thermal overload state.
player_impact: Warns you when automated defenses need time to cool.

layman_description: Dust and particle effects when mining or gathering resources.
technical_description: Toggles visual effect system during extraction actions.
player_impact: Makes harvesting more visually satisfying with dust and sparkles.

layman_description: How fast crops or plants grow on farmland.
technical_description: Time coefficient for plant maturation progression.
player_impact: Faster growth rates mean shorter wait times for harvested crops.

layman_description: Whether plant growth happens at unpredictable times.
technical_description: Randomization toggle for maturation timing.
player_impact: Random growth makes farming feel less predictable and more organic.

layman_description: Size scale of items when viewing them in the menu before placing.
technical_description: Display scaling for item preview in placement mode.
player_impact: Larger preview makes small items easier to see before construction.

layman_description: How much force a creature gets pushed back when hit.
technical_description: Knockback multiplier for impact force calculation.
player_impact: Higher pushback makes combat feel more reactive and satisfying.

layman_description: Durability restored per use of a repair item.
technical_description: Healing value applied during maintenance crafting.
player_impact: Better repair tools fix items faster and reduce material costs.

layman_description: Body part a creature uses to hold weapons or attack with.
technical_description: Animation bone attachment point for equipped items.
player_impact: Affects where and how creatures wield their weapons visually.

layman_description: Whether a block runs its function without needing player activation.
technical_description: Autonomous operation toggle for active mechanics.
player_impact: Auto-running blocks perform their job continuously without manual triggers.

layman_description: Points awarded for defeating a creature.
technical_description: Numerical value added to player scoreboard on entity elimination.
player_impact: Bigger scores make defeating tough enemies more rewarding.

layman_description: Volume level that wakes sleeping zombies from sound.
technical_description: Decibel threshold for ambient sound detection by sleeping entities.
player_impact: Louder activities wake nearby sleeping zombies easier.

layman_description: Odds that a sleeping zombie responds to a sound it hears.
technical_description: Probability multiplier for sound-triggered awareness.
player_impact: Lower chances let you be quieter near sleeping zeds without waking them.

layman_description: Volume threshold that fully awakens sleeping zombies.
technical_description: Sound intensity value to transition from sense to active state.
player_impact: Makes stealth approach harder against sleeping hordes.

layman_description: Farthest distance at which a sleeping zombie notices you.
technical_description: Maximum vision range for entity perception in dormant state.
player_impact: Sleeping zombies spot you from far away if you're in their sight.

layman_description: Closest distance within view where sleeping zombies ignore you.
technical_description: Minimum vision range threshold for awareness triggering.
player_impact: Sleeping zeds might miss you if you stay very close.

layman_description: Farthest distance at which sleeping zombies fully awaken and attack.
technical_description: Maximum trigger range for complete entity activation.
player_impact: Far zombies might not fully wake unless you're very visible.

layman_description: Closest sighting distance that guarantees full zombie awakening.
technical_description: Minimum range for definite entity aggression state.
player_impact: Getting very close definitely wakes sleeping zombies quickly.

layman_description: Item that goes into a block's energy or tool slot.
technical_description: Equipment type accepted in block machinery slots.
player_impact: Only specific items power certain machines.

layman_description: How long a creature stays alert after hearing danger.
technical_description: Duration value for heightened awareness state.
player_impact: Creatures seek you longer if they heard sounds.

layman_description: Audio that plays when a creature dies from drowning.
technical_description: Sound effect reference for water-based fatality event.
player_impact: Drowning creatures produce unique death sounds.

layman_description: Gurgling sounds creatures make while suffocating in water.
technical_description: Audio file for underwater damage state.
player_impact: Drowning feels more immersive with distress sounds.

layman_description: Minor injury sounds when taking small damage.
technical_description: Audio reference for low-damage impact events.
player_impact: Different pain sounds for minor vs major injuries.

layman_description: Audio effect when creatures jump or leap.
technical_description: Sound file for jump action auditory feedback.
player_impact: Jumping creatures make noise giving away position.

layman_description: Loud thud when creatures fall from high and hit hard.
technical_description: Audio for high-velocity impact from falling.
player_impact: Heavy falls create noise alerting nearby enemies.

layman_description: Quiet stepping sounds when creatures land gently.
technical_description: Audio for low-impact ground contact.
player_impact: Careful movement is quieter than clumsy jumping.

layman_description: Heavy footstep effect when you land after dropping.
technical_description: Audio feedback for player vertical descent completion.
player_impact: Your footsteps make noise when landing, risking detection.

layman_description: Breathing and exertion sounds when stamina runs low.
technical_description: Audio cue for energy depletion state.
player_impact: Heavy breathing alerts nearby enemies to your exhaustion.

layman_description: Splashing sounds when creatures break water surface.
technical_description: Audio for aquatic entry point disturbance.
player_impact: Creatures surfacing in water make detectable splashing.

layman_description: Audio feedback when you stop using a weapon mid-action.
technical_description: Sound event for action interruption.
player_impact: Canceling actions produces audio cues.

layman_description: Noise when you pull back a bowstring before firing.
technical_description: Audio for weapon charge-up action.
player_impact: Drawing weapons makes sound that creatures can hear.

layman_description: Whether a block doesn't care if it's properly supported.
technical_description: Toggle for structural integrity enforcement on blocks.
player_impact: Some blocks won't collapse even without proper foundation.

layman_description: Whether an item can be used to gather resources from blocks.
technical_description: Flag enabling material extraction with this equipment.
player_impact: Only harvest tools can break blocks and collect materials.

layman_description: How high above water a creature's head appears when swimming.
technical_description: Vertical position adjustment for aquatic animation state.
player_impact: Affects how swimming creatures position relative to water level.

layman_description: Audio alert when automated defenses lock onto a threat.
technical_description: Sound effect for target acquisition event.
player_impact: Turrets make targeting sounds when they find enemies.

layman_description: Whether this item can be broken down into materials.
technical_description: Classification toggle for resource extraction crafting.
player_impact: Salvageable items can be broken down to recover materials.

layman_description: How fast turrets or creatures rotate to face targets.
technical_description: Rotation velocity for entity aiming mechanics.
player_impact: Faster turning turrets are harder to avoid.

layman_description: Automated defense turret that can be placed and activated.
technical_description: Entity type reference for autonomous weaponry.
player_impact: Place turrets to defend your base from attacks.

layman_description: Position adjustment for weapon strike point when upgraded.
technical_description: Spatial offset for impact calculation on enhanced items.
player_impact: Upgraded weapons hit from slightly different positions.

layman_description: Whether melee weapons show an aiming reticle in the menu.
technical_description: Display mode for close-combat targeting indicator.
player_impact: Melee weapons show aiming aids like ranged weapons.

layman_description: Whether a weapon can perform charged heavy attacks.
technical_description: Toggle for enhanced damage action availability.
player_impact: Holding attack button charges powerful strikes.

layman_description: Relative scale of a vehicle affecting its handling and capacity.
technical_description: Dimension multiplier for vehicle footprint and storage.
player_impact: Larger vehicles carry more but turn slower.

layman_description: Audio that plays when sleeping zombies suddenly awaken.
technical_description: Sound effect for dormant entity activation event.
player_impact: Waking zombies alert other creatures with noise.

layman_description: Seconds it takes a sleeping zombie to become fully alert.
technical_description: Duration for state transition from dormant to active.
player_impact: Slow wakeup gives you time to escape before it attacks.

layman_description: Extra difficulty increase applied to quest enemies.
technical_description: Additive modifier to entity power calculation.
player_impact: Quest challenges get proportionally harder creatures.

layman_description: Multiplier controlling how much difficulty scales enemy strength.
technical_description: Scaling factor for progressive difficulty progression.
player_impact: Higher settings make enemies scale faster as you progress.

layman_description: Power applied when vehicles or creatures jump.
technical_description: Impulse value for vertical momentum generation.
player_impact: Stronger hop force lets vehicles jump higher obstacles.

layman_description: Brightness setting for glowing parts of vehicle surfaces.
technical_description: Light emission value for vehicle material rendering.
player_impact: Brighter emissive parts make vehicles more visible at night.

layman_description: Visual style copied from another vehicle part.
technical_description: Texture set reference for material appearance.
player_impact: Different vehicle mods have different visual looks.

layman_description: Vehicle parts that disappear when another mod is installed.
technical_description: Asset hiding behavior during modification application.
player_impact: Vehicle mods swap appearance of multiple parts at once.

layman_description: Type of vehicle modification you can install.
technical_description: Equipment class for vehicular upgrade system.
player_impact: Different mods change vehicle handling and appearance.

layman_description: Amount of sand produced when mining certain blocks.
technical_description: Quantity value for material byproduct generation.
player_impact: Higher yields get more building materials per mining action.

layman_description: Amount of mechanical springs found in salvaged items.
technical_description: Loot quantity for mechanical component extraction.
player_impact: More springs means easier crafting of complex items.

layman_description: How many extra creatures appear during a quest wave.
technical_description: Quantity scalar for entity generation events.
player_impact: Higher multipliers spawn bigger enemy hordes.

layman_description: Brightness of vehicle tail lights or rear glow.
technical_description: Light intensity for rear-facing luminous elements.
player_impact: Bright tail lights help you see vehicles in darkness.

layman_description: Whether creatures coordinate to surround prey in formation.
technical_description: Tactical grouping behavior toggle for entity swarms.
player_impact: Grouped creatures try to surround you instead of rushing straight.

layman_description: Who or what a creature prioritizes attacking.
technical_description: Target selection criteria for entity aggression logic.
player_impact: Some creatures ignore you to attack other enemies.

layman_description: Special behavior pattern a creature can execute.
technical_description: Action sequence in entity behavior state machine.
player_impact: Creatures perform scripted attack patterns.

layman_description: Delay before a block activates after being triggered.
technical_description: Startup latency for machinery functionality.
player_impact: Activated blocks respond slowly to your signals.

layman_description: Whether a block runs constantly without needing activation.
technical_description: Persistent operation toggle for autonomous blocks.
player_impact: Always-on blocks never rest and consume steady power.

layman_description: Type of block that gets placed by this item.
technical_description: Entity reference for placed structure instantiation.
player_impact: Using this item creates the corresponding block.

layman_description: Status effects automatically applied to a creature.
technical_description: Effect set for persistent entity state modification.
player_impact: Creatures with buffs have enhanced abilities or resistances.

layman_description: Whether an item falls to ground after use or vanishes.
technical_description: Persistence toggle for consumed item entities.
player_impact: Dropped items can be picked up again if not lost.

layman_description: Message displayed when a resource collector has no items.
technical_description: Localized text string for empty state notification.
player_impact: Status messages tell you when collectors need service.

layman_description: Label for first resource a collector has gathered.
technical_description: Inventory slot display text for first product.
player_impact: You see what resources collectors have produced.

layman_description: Label for second resource a collector has gathered.
technical_description: Inventory slot display text for secondary product.
player_impact: Multi-output blocks show all their produced resources.

layman_description: Audio that plays when a resource finishes converting.
technical_description: Sound event for production completion notification.
player_impact: Converters alert you when goods are ready.

layman_description: What resource a collector produces from gathered materials.
technical_description: Output item type for conversion processing.
player_impact: Collectors automatically refine raw materials into useful items.

layman_description: Whether paint colors transfer to damaged block versions.
technical_description: Aesthetic attribute preservation during degradation.
player_impact: Damaged blocks keep their painted colors.

layman_description: How a creature lowers itself to crouch or hide.
technical_description: Animation stance configuration for reduced height positioning.
player_impact: Crouching creatures are harder to see and hit.

layman_description: Camera height when a player crouches for a stealthy view.
technical_description: Vertical position adjustment for first-person crouch mode.
player_impact: Crouching lowers your view and makes you quieter.

layman_description: How much injury a block takes from hits.
technical_description: Damage multiplier for structural integrity calculation.
player_impact: Tougher blocks take more hits to break down.

layman_description: Which picture appears when an item has no custom image set.
technical_description: Fallback icon reference for menu display.
player_impact: Items show default pictures in your menu.

layman_description: Event triggered when a block is completely broken.
technical_description: Action sequence firing on structural failure.
player_impact: Breaking certain blocks triggers special effects.

layman_description: Things that grab creature attention besides you.
technical_description: Entity classification for alternative target selection.
player_impact: Some creatures can be distracted by noise or other threats.

layman_description: Event that triggers when a block takes damage.
technical_description: Action sequence for structural degradation.
player_impact: Damaged blocks can trigger sounds or effects.

layman_description: What fraction of value you get selling this item to merchants.
technical_description: Price multiplier for vendor transaction calculations.
player_impact: Some items sell for much less than their crafting cost.

layman_description: Creature types that cannot step on a block.
technical_description: Entity filter for pathfinding obstruction.
player_impact: Some creatures can't walk on specific blocks.

layman_description: How damaged a creature must be before it explodes.
technical_description: Health ratio trigger for detonation event.
player_impact: Critical creatures may explode dangerously.

layman_description: Whether a weapon detonates when it strikes something.
technical_description: Impact detonation toggle for explosive weapons.
player_impact: Explosive weapons trigger on contact with targets.

layman_description: Status effect applied by an explosion.
technical_description: Effect type for blast damage aftermath.
player_impact: Explosions inflict lingering effects like burning or radiation.

layman_description: Weapon or item a crawling creature holds.
technical_description: Equipment reference for low-profile entity loadout.
player_impact: Crawling creatures use different weapons than walkers.

layman_description: Whether a ranged weapon shows reload animation.
technical_description: Animation sequence availability toggle for ammunition refresh.
player_impact: Some weapons show you reloading while others just swap ammo.

layman_description: Background noise emitted by idle machinery or creatures.
technical_description: Ambient audio for dormant state conditions.
player_impact: Running machines and idle creatures make constant background noise.

layman_description: Whether something is a wild animal rather than zombie.
technical_description: Entity classification for non-hostile behavior systems.
player_impact: Animals behave differently from infected creatures.

layman_description: Whether a creature or character is male or female.
technical_description: Gender attribute for animation and model selection.
player_impact: Different sexes might have different sounds or appearances.

layman_description: Color tint displayed behind item icons in menus.
technical_description: Color setting for inventory display styling.
player_impact: Different colored backgrounds help organize your inventory visually.

layman_description: Special backdrop picture shown behind item icons.
technical_description: Decorative background asset for menu presentation.
player_impact: Item icons have themed backdrops for easier recognition.

layman_description: Speed at which knocked-down creatures recover to standing.
technical_description: Recovery rate during kneeling debilitation state.
player_impact: Slowly recovering creatures give you time to deal damage.

layman_description: How long creatures stay stunned when knocked to knees.
technical_description: Stun duration for knockdown state.
player_impact: Longer stuns mean more time to attack defenseless enemies.

layman_description: Speed creatures recover from being knocked flat on ground.
technical_description: Recovery rate during prone incapacitation state.
player_impact: Prone creatures slowly get back up if you don't finish them.
